database_operations module¶

database_operations.add_new_user(cnx, req)¶

Adding new user to database

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘login’, ‘password’, ‘name’, ‘email’, ‘birth_date’ and ‘surname’ keys

Returns

“Added user: klient_id=<id>”

Return type

Statement like

database_operations.check_user(cnx, req)¶

Check if login and password are in database

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘login’ and ‘password’ key

Returns

Id of logged user or 0

database_operations.get_groups(cnx, req)¶

Get all users group

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘login’ key

Returns

Json object with list of groups

database_operations.group_add(cnx, req)¶

Add new group

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘group_name’ key

Returns

“Added” statement

database_operations.new_group_payment(cnx, req)¶

Add new group payment

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘’quota’, ‘category’, ‘description’, ‘person_pay’

Returns

“Added” statement or failed statement

database_operations.new_income(cnx, req)¶

Add new income

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘id’ key

Returns

“Added” statement if an income was added

database_operations.new_outgo(cnx, req)¶

Add new outgoing

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘id’ key

Returns

“Added” statement if an income was added

database_operations.show_all(cnx, req)¶

Showing all transactions for specified user

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘id’ key

Returns

String like json object which contains all incomes and outgoings

database_operations.show_balance(cnx, req)¶

Show group balance

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘login’ and ‘group_id’ key

Returns

Json object with group balance

database_operations.show_history(cnx, req)¶

Showing groups payment history

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘login’ key

Returns

Json object with history list

database_operations.user_exist(cnx, req)¶

Check if user with this login exists

Parameters

  • cnx – Database handler

  • req – Incoming request, should contain ‘login’ key

Returns

“YES or “NO” strings

cash-up-server
